original_text: The men wore belts around their bodies. They wore large cloths around their heads. They looked like Babylonian army officers who came from Chaldea.
korean_text: 그 형상은 허리를 띠로 동이고 머리를 긴 수건으로 쌌으며 그의 용모는 다 준수한 자 곧 그의 고향 갈대아 바벨론 사람 같은 것이라

sentences.original_text: The men wore belts around their bodies.
They wore large cloths around their heads.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 머리에 큰 천을 두르고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They looked like Babylonian army officers
